description: Everything Works:Marine buddies Dave and Hawk go for a Jeep ride in the hills to get away from it all.  What they get into is each other, as big-boned, blond Dave really lets go with super-handsome young Hawk.  The surly brunet warrior dominates his sex starved pal, as these two exceptional studs turn in a performance you'll return to again and again.
title: Hayride, Scene #02
